name: Super Speed - Max Drifting Pro
description:
Super Speed - Max Drifting Pro 3 is a very addictive game. You can drive everywhere, join the fantastic street challenges in the huge open world and drive your customized car to explore astonishing places!
Features:
- stunning 3D graphics
- Realistic racing physical effects
- all kinds of cool car
- Customize your own car
- Real scene environment
- Simple and smooth control
- realistic engine sound
- Shocked music and sound effects
- addictive game
